title: Madytos
description: Settlement located in the modern town of Eceabat on the Gallipoli Peninsula containing signs of continuous habitation from the 3rd millennium BCE through the Medieval period.

properties.description: Polygon representing the extent of the Kilisetepe Höyüğü site, derived from an OpenStreetMap Way.
properties.title: OSM location of Kilisetepe Höyüğü
